extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     ITLN205.
Exclusions    No more than 3.0 units from ITLN230; ITLN234; ITLN332; LLCU234

basic.description:
A survey of Italian literature, through selected texts of representative authors, from the eighteenth century to the present. 
NOTE    Taught in English together with LLCU 234/3.0. Students submit written assignments, tests, and examinations in Italian.
basic.subject: ITLN
basic.title: Survey of Italian Literature II
